wikipedia_page.main: Clifford Johnson (24 February 1914 – 22 July 1989) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for York City, Wolverhampton Wanderers, Port Vale and Torquay United.

response: Cliff Johnson is the name of:
*Cliff Johnson (baseball) (born 1947), former Major League Baseball designated hitter
*Cliff Johnson (game designer) (born 1953), computer puzzle games creator
*Cliff Johnson (rugby league), New Zealand rugby league footballer
